main event: Two pilots from Langley AFB observed a stationary or low-speed moving white or grayish-white light in the sky for about 10 minutes.
interesting points: The object was about 5 to 10 degrees above the horizon,The pilots were unable to determine the nature of the object,The sighting lasted for a total of 10 minutes,The object was not seen to make any noise,There was no physical evidence found.
